project_descr: Strengthening the Capacity of Budget Oversight for Peoples' Elected Bodies in Vietnam

outputs.output_descr:
Strengthening the budget oversight capacity of the CFBA
Strengthening the capacity of local People's Councils in budgetary decision-making and oversight
Enhancing the cooperation and effectiveness of the participation in budget oversight by the NA Ethnic Council and other agencies of the National Assembly
